因人工智能需求，iPhone 制造商鸿海利润超出预期
item.description: 重要的 iPhone 组装商鸿海精密工业股份有限公司（Hon Hai Precision Industry Co.【原文：Key iPhone assembler Hon Hai Precision Industry Co. reported a stronger-than-expected quarterly profit on persistent demand for servers powering AI applications.】

item.title: 亿万富翁阿里的露露公司在阿布扎比巨额首次公开募股后首次亮相即下跌
item.description: 露露零售控股公司（Lulu Retail Holdings Plc）在首次公开募股 17.2 亿美元后股价下跌，这在中东地区十分罕见，因为在中东地区，上市公司股票在早盘交易中通常会带来丰厚的回报。【原文：Lulu Retail Holdings Plc’s shares fell after its $1.72 billion initial public offering, a rarity in the Middle East where listings have typically offered stellar returns in early trading.】

item.title: ASML 坚守 2030 年销售预测，押注人工智能驱动的需求
item.description: 对全球供应链至关重要的先进芯片制造设备的荷兰制造商 ASML Holding NV 重申其看好长期收入前景，因为该公司押注于人工智能驱动的半导体需求增长。【原文：ASML Holding NV, the Dutch maker of advanced chip-making machines that are critical to the world’s supply chains, reaffirmed its bullish long-term revenue outlook as it bets on an artificial intelligence-driven boom in semiconductor demand.】

item.title: StanChart 在印度改革中失去四位融资银行家
item.description: 渣打银行（Standard Chartered Plc）在印度和新加坡的融资和信贷业务正在进行全球重组，同时活跃的交易市场增加了对银行家的需求。【原文：Standard Chartered Plc is losing a handful of executives at its financing and credit business across India and Singapore amid a global restructuring and as an active dealmaking market boosts demand for bankers.】

item.title: 德国电信盈利因美国和德国的发展势头而增长
item.description: 欧洲最大的电信运营商德国电信股份公司（Deutsche Telekom AG）通过成本控制以及在美国和德国的强劲表现，在第三季度提高了盈利能力。【原文：Deutsche Telekom AG, Europe’s largest telecommunications operator, increased profitability in the third quarter through cost discipline and a strong performance in the US and Germany.】

item.title: 西门子认为数据中心的繁荣有助于抵消自动化行业的低迷
item.description: 由于电气化基础设施产品需求强劲，抵消了工厂自动化设备市场持续疲软的影响，西门子公司预计明年收入将实现稳健增长。【原文：Siemens AG expects solid revenue growth next year as strong demand for its electrification infrastructure products offsets a continued weak market for factory-automation equipment.】

item.title: 随着欧洲电气化进程的推进，EON 将电网支出提高 20
item.description: 德国公用事业公司 EON SE 在今年前九个月将投资额提高了 20%，以帮助推动能源转型。【原文：German utility EON SE ramped up investments by 20% in the first nine months of the year to help drive the energy transition.】

item.title: 默克集团因生命科学部门业绩增长而超出预期
item.description: 默克集团公布的盈利超过预期，其生命科学部门从大流行病后的低迷中恢复过来，同时其他两大业务也呈现出积极的增长趋势。【原文：Merck KGaA posted earnings that topped estimates as its life science unit recovers from its post-pandemic slump alongside positive growth trends in its other two businesses.】

item.title: 据说科威特将考虑更换 1 万亿美元财富基金的管理者
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，科威特官员正在考虑对该国 1 万亿美元的财富基金进行改革，包括可能更换其总经理。【原文：Kuwaiti officials are considering changes atop the country’s $1 trillion wealth fund, including potentially replacing its managing director, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 台湾称台积电在美投资有助于实现贸易平衡
item.description: 台湾一位高级官员表示，台湾半导体制造股份有限公司在美国的数百亿美元投资有助于减少台湾岛与其主要安全伙伴的贸易顺差，因为出口依赖型经济体正为美国当选总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）威胁对进口商品征收额外关税做准备。【原文：Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co.’s tens of billions of dollars of investments in the US help reduce the archipelago’s trade surplus with its primary security partner, a senior Taiwanese official said, as export-reliant economies brace for US President-elect Donald Trump, who is threatening additional tariffs on imports.】

item.title: 马里索要 1.6 亿美元后，Resolute 股票停牌
item.description: 在马里要求这家澳大利亚金矿公司支付约 1.6 亿美元以解决其首席执行官被拘留的税务纠纷后，Resolute Mining Ltd. 暂停交易。【原文：Resolute Mining Ltd. suspended trading after Mali demanded the Australian gold miner pay about $160 million to resolve a tax dispute that’s seen its chief executive officer detained.】

item.title: 台风 "乌沙基 "将袭击菲律宾，这是一系列风暴中的最新一个
item.description: 菲律宾正在为三周内的第五次强风暴做准备，超强台风 "乌莎姬 "将于周四下午袭击菲律宾北部，然后向台湾方向移动。【原文：The Philippines is bracing for its fifth powerful storm in three weeks, with Super Typhoon Usagi set to strike the country’s north on Thursday afternoon before tracking toward Taiwan.】

item.title: 吉利将整合 Zeekr、Lynk&Co 品牌以精简成本
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，浙江吉利控股集团有限公司计划将旗下高端电动汽车品牌Zeekr与智能汽车品牌Lynk & Co.整合，进行重组，旨在消除重复建设，节约成本。【原文：Zhejiang Geely Holding Group Co. plans to integrate its premium electric vehicle brand Zeekr with its smart car marque Lynk & Co. in a restructuring aimed at eliminating duplication and saving costs, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 泰国同性婚姻法将带来 20 亿美元的 "彩虹旅游 "收益
item.description: 根据旅游平台 Agoda 的数据，泰国同性婚姻合法化这一具有里程碑意义的举措将促进 "彩虹旅游"，每年将吸引 400 万游客，并带来约 20 亿美元的收入。【原文：Thailand’s landmark move to legalize same-sex marriage is set to boost “rainbow tourism” by attracting four million more visitors annually, and generate about $2 billion in revenue, according to travel platform Agoda.】

item.title: 英国将详细说明加密货币计划，初创企业关注美国特朗普的利益
item.description: 英国政府将在本月制定加密货币行业监管计划，以消除唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）领导的美国对加密货币行业的诱惑，努力让企业对其在英国的前景放心。【原文：The British government will seek to combat the lure of a Donald Trump-led US to the cryptocurrency industry by setting out its plans to regulate the sector this month, an effort to reassure firms about their UK prospects.】

item.title: 据说新加坡科技公司 Circles 正在考虑出售数字业务部门
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，Circles Global 是一家技术公司，其支持者包括私募股权公司华平投资（Warburg Pincus），该公司正在考虑出售其数字电信服务提供商 Circles.Life，因为潜在投资者对此很感兴趣。【原文：Circles Global, a technology company whose backers include private equity firm Warburg Pincus, is considering a sale of its digital telecom services provider Circles.Life amid interest from prospective investors, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: <strong>特朗普第二任期将如何影响澳大利亚投资者</strong
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的第二个任期内，哪些投资将成为赢家和输家？在本周的播客中，丽贝卡-琼斯（Rebecca Jones）向彭博市场记者理查德-亨德森（Richard Henderson）询问了美国大选结果对股票、债券、加密货币和澳大利亚人抵押贷款的影响。【原文：What investments are going to be the winners and losers from Donald Trump’s second term? Markets have already gone into overdrive following the US election result, and that’s with weeks to go before the President-elect even returns to the White House.In this week’s podcast, Rebecca Jones asks Bloomberg markets reporter Richard Henderson about the implications for stocks, bonds, crypto and — yes — Australians’ mortgages.Listen to and follow The Bloomberg Australia Podcast on Apple, Spotify, on Yo】

item.title: 首席执行官因税务冲突被马里拘留后，Resolute 暂停交易
item.description: 在马里要求这家澳大利亚金矿公司支付约 1.6 亿美元以解决其首席执行官被拘留的税务纠纷后，Resolute Mining Ltd. 暂停了交易。【原文：Resolute Mining Ltd. halted trading after Mali demanded the Australian gold miner pay about $160 million to resolve a tax dispute that’s seen its chief executive officer detained.】

item.title: 瑞银在高管离职后填补领导职位空缺
item.description: 据知情人士透露，瑞银集团（UBS Group AG）在一些高层离职后，对投资银行业务的领导层进行了一系列调整，以加强医疗保健和杠杆融资等领域的业务。【原文：UBS Group AG has made a string of investment banking leadership changes following some senior departures as the Swiss lender seeks to bolster areas such as health care and leveraged finance, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 人民币资金需求因看跌押注和干预担忧而上升
item.description: 由于美国当选总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的关税威胁以及对当局可能采取干预措施以缓和看跌押注的忧虑，人民币汇率受到压力，远期市场发出了人民币将进一步下跌的预期信号。【原文：The forwards market is signaling expectations for further yuan losses as the currency is pressured by US President-elect Donald Trump’s tariff threats and angst over potential intervention from the authorities to temper bearish bets.】

item.title: 中国股市困境下闪现看涨信号
item.description: 早些时候席卷中国股市的亢奋情绪已经消退，但一系列指标表明，市场仍然看涨，这可能会支撑股价。【原文：The euphoria that swept across Chinese stock market earlier has fizzled, but a slew of indicators point to a still-bullish sentiment that can support share prices.】

item.title: 关西电力因股票出售计划创 50 多年来最大跌幅
item.description: 关西电力公司（Kansai Electric Power Co.）股价创下至少 50 年来最大跌幅，此前该公司表示计划通过出售股票筹集多达 5,049 亿日元（32 亿美元）的资金，这加剧了市场对盈利摊薄的担忧。【原文：Kansai Electric Power Co. shares saw their biggest drop in at least 50 years after the Japanese utility said it plans to raise as much as ¥504.9 billion ($3.2 billion) from a share sale, fueling concerns about earnings dilution.】

item.title: 尽管要约被撤回，韩国锌业监管调查仍将继续
item.description: 韩国金融监管机构将继续调查韩国锌业公司（Korea Zinc Co.【原文：South Korea’s financial watchdog will press ahead with its probe into Korea Zinc Co.’s disputed $1.8 billion share sale plan, which the company scrapped on Wednesday bowing to regulatory pressures.】

item.title: 亚洲基金经理看淡印度股市，转向中国和日本
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 美元延续大选后涨势，铜价跌破 9000 美元
item.description: 由于美元延续了美国大选后的涨势，铜价两个月来首次跌破每吨 9,000 美元。【原文：Copper fell below $9,000 a ton for the first time in two months as the dollar extended gains made in the wake of the US election.】

item.title: 中国向关键工厂枢纽电力市场的太阳能企业伸出援手
item.description: 中国正在推进更多利用其丰富的风能和太阳能资源的计划，以争取在本十年末全面放开电力市场。【原文：China is advancing plans to utilize more of its vast wind and solar resources, as it moves toward fully liberalizing the market for electricity by the end of the decade.】

item.title: 资本外流加剧日元困境，盈余创历史新高
item.description: 日本经济增长缓慢，资本外流迅速，加深了日元的贬值压力。【原文：Brisk capital outflows from a slow-growing Japanese economy are deepening depreciation pressure on the yen.】

item.title: 面对美元回升，中国人民银行坚持支持人民币汇率
item.description: 中国已连续第二天通过其管理货币的每日参考汇率来支持承压的人民币。【原文：China moved to support the under-pressure yuan for a second day, through its daily reference rate for the managed currency.】
